sentences.sentence: More than 120 people have been killed after an earthquake hit northwestern China overnight in the nation's deadliest quake in nine years. sentences.sentence: Russia has damaged or destroyed almost every building in the eastern Ukrainian city of Advyka, according to a new report. It is part of a major assault plan, which has seen civilian infrastructure like schools and hospitals deliberately flattened. Over the last 24 hours, Russia has launched dozens of drones at Ukrainian cities in what's become a nightly barrage, while trying to put together a ground offensive in eastern Ukraine with limited success, Ukrainian troops so far being relatively well-armed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And that means the price of food and many other goods will inevitably rise. PRESS SECRETARY, ANTONY PELOSI, EU COUNCIL OF THE EU, PROTECT, STRENGTHEN, ANTICIPATE.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Those are the watchwords of the 13th Belgian presidency of the Council of the EU, which begins on January 1.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The country will take the lead in joint discussions during what promises to be a turbulent political period, with the European elections at the beginning of June in its sights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In practice, the Belgian presidency will not have the usual full six months to complete the 150 dossiers on the table.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: For the Prime Minister, the first priority is to protect citizens and turn the EU towards the future. The second element is to strengthen our economy, an economy that creates prosperity, that creates employment, that finances our social solidarity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Helping this economy to make the transition towards a sustainable economy, an industry that helps us achieve the objectives of the Green Deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: When it comes to the EU's Green Deal, the Belgian presidency will have to reach an agreement on carbon emissions from trucks and buses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It will also have the task of reaching an inter-institutional compromise on packaging, which aims to reduce, reuse and recycle these products.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Finally, Belgium will oversee the first discussions on the bloc's environmental targets for 2040.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A Belgian-style compromise will also be required to reach agreement on the revision of the union's multi-annual budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last week, the E.U.'s 27 leaders were unable to agree on a budget increase requested by the European Commission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Finally, reform of the E.U. and the possible enlargement of it will be discussed during this six-month period.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It is to prepare our Europe to be more efficient.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And before we become bigger, we must become better.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We must become better in a faster decision-making that helps us keep our unity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The signals being sent out by the Belgian authorities on enlargement will be closely followed by the 27 EU member states as they celebrate the 20th anniversary of the Union's great Eastward enlargement in the first half of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Marvel has dropped rising Hollywood star Jonathan Majors from its superhero blockbusters after he was convicted of assaulting and harassing his ex-girlfriend Grace Jabari. The actor is facing up to one year imprisonment, which has upended Marvel's plans for the franchise, which has his character Kang the Conqueror in a prime role in multiple upcoming films. The jury of six people were presented with evidence illustrating a cycle of abuse and escalating patterns of coercion. After three days, they determined that Majors had assaulted and harassed his girlfriend.
